short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Easily create UI components by adjusting sliders to get a preview and then simply copying the CSS.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
With the UI component creator you can easily create UI components by using sliders and color pickers.
This way you can get a quick preview of the UI component you might want to use when create a website.
Right now, it is in the earliest version.
Therefore you can only customize a button.
I am working on adding more components:
- Sliders
- Color Pickers
- Cards
- Accordions
- Etc.

I hope to soon add animation support as well.
Another option I want to add, is the option to click an element in the DOM and customize it from the extension popup.

Made by Thaeke Hekkenberg
